00078 //  CLASS : sc_length_param

00083 class SC_API sc_length_param
00084 {
00085 public:
00086 
00087              sc_length_param();
00088              sc_length_param( int );
00089              sc_length_param( const sc_length_param& );
00090     explicit sc_length_param( sc_without_context );

00095                               const sc_length_param& );

00097                               const sc_length_param& );
00098 
00099     int len() const;
00100     void len( int );
00101 
00102     const std::string to_string() const;
00103 
00104     void print( ::std::ostream& = ::std::cout ) const;
00105     void dump( ::std::ostream& = ::std::cout ) const;
00106 
00107 private:
00108 
00109     int m_len;
00110 };

00134 inline
00135 sc_length_param::sc_length_param() : m_len()
00136 {
00137     *this = sc_length_context::default_value();
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline
00141 sc_length_param::sc_length_param( int len_ ) : m_len(len_)
00142 {
00143     SC_CHECK_WL_( len_ );
00144 }
00145 
00146 inline
00147 sc_length_param::sc_length_param( const sc_length_param& a )
00148     : m_len( a.m_len )
00149 {}
00150 
00151 inline
00152 sc_length_param::sc_length_param( sc_without_context )
00153     : m_len( SC_DEFAULT_WL_ )
00154 {}
00155 
00156 
00157 inline
00158 sc_length_param&
00159 sc_length_param::operator = ( const sc_length_param& a )
00160 {
00161     if( &a != this )
00162     {
00163         m_len = a.m_len;
00164     }
00165     return *this;
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 inline
00170 bool
00171 operator == ( const sc_length_param& a, const sc_length_param& b )
00172 {
00173     return ( a.m_len == b.m_len );
00174 }
00175 
00176 inline
00177 bool
00178 operator != ( const sc_length_param& a, const sc_length_param& b )
00179 {
00180     return ( a.m_len != b.m_len );
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 inline
00185 int
00186 sc_length_param::len() const
00187 {
00188     return m_len;
00189 }
00190 
00191 inline
00192 void
00193 sc_length_param::len( int len_ )
00194 {
00195     SC_CHECK_WL_( len_ );
00196     m_len = len_;
00197 }
00198

00200 inline
00201 ::std::ostream&
00202 operator << ( ::std::ostream& os, const sc_length_param& a )
00203 {
00204     a.print( os );
00205     return os;
00206 }
